[00:00.00]Come Thru (Explicit) - Summer Walker/Usher (亚瑟小子)
[00:02.69]Lyrics by：Summer Walker/Usher Raymond IV/Jermaine Dupri/Manuel Seal Jr./London Holmes/Aubrey Robinson/Kendall Roark Bailey/Nija Charles

[00:22.38]Thinkin' of all the things that we did

[00:26.74]'Cause s**t like this don't happen too often
